title: The Art of Dinu Lipatti (Piano)
description:
FLAC+CUE+scans


Contents:
Disc 1:
1-3. Chopin - Piano Concerto No.1(*)
4-6. Mozart - Piano Concerto No.21(**)

Disc 2:
1-3. Grieg - Piano Concerto Op.16(***)
4-6. Schumann - Piano Concerto Op.54(*)

Disc 3:
1-3. Mozart - Piano Sonata No.8, K.310
4-9. J.S.Bach - Partita No.1, BWV.825
10-13. Chopin - Piano Sonata No.3, Op.58

Disc 4:
1-14. Chopin - Valses

Disc 5:
1. J.S.Bach - Jesu. Joy of Man's Desiring (from Church Canata No.147)
2. Scralatti - Sonata in E Major, L.23
3. Scralatti - Sonata in D Minor, L.413
4. Chopin - Barcarolle in F Sharp minor, Op.60
5. Liszt - Sonetto del Petrarca No.104
6. Ravel - Alborada del Gracioso
7. Enesco - Piano Sonata No.3, Op.24

Disc 6: (His Last Recital at Besancon Festival)
1. J.S.Bach - Partita No.1, BWV.825
2-4. Mozart - Piano Sonata No.8, K.310
5. Schubert - Impromptu in G Flat major, D.899-3
6. Schubert - Impromptu in E Flat Major, D.899-2

Disc 7: (His Last Recital at Besancon Festival)
Chopin - Valses

Disc 8:
1. Chopin - Etude in E minor, Op.25-5
2. Chopin - Etude in G Flat Major, Op.10-5

9. Brahms - Waltzes, Op.39 (Nos.6,15,2,1,14,10,5)




Performer:
Dinu Lipatti, piano
